text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them
author: Walt Disney

text: Our chief want in life, is someone who shall make us do what we can. This is the service of a friend. With him, we are easily great
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Tough times never last, but tough people do
author: Robert H. Schuller

text: Don’t worry about being successful but work toward being significant and the success will naturally follow
author: Oprah Winfrey

text: Remember why you started
author: Unknown

text: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others
author: Mandy Hale

text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
author: Walt Disney

text: The Team! The Team! The Team!
author: Bo Schembechler

text: You have to believe it before you see it
author: Unknown

text: Be so good they can’t ignore you
author: Steve Martin

text: Never underestimate the power of a t-shirt
author: Unknown

text: Be the change you wish to see in the world
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: An entrepreneur tends to bite off a little more than he can chew hoping he’ll quickly learn how to chew it
author: Roy Ash

text: We all have things we must do that we don’t really care to do and things we must do that we don’t mind doing, then there’s the goofing off
author: Mi Oon

text: A ship in the harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for
author: John A. Shedd

text: If you don’t have big dreams and goals, you’ll end up working for someone that does
author: Unknown

text: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work
author: Thomas Edison

text: Because, you know, resilience – if you think of it in terms of the Gold Rush, then you’d be pretty depressed right now because the last nugget of gold would be gone. But the good thing is, with innovation, there isn’t a last nugget. Every new thing creates two new questions and two new opportunities
author: Jeff Bezos

text: Don’t worry about failure; you only have to be right once
author: Drew Houston

text: In carrying out e-commerce, the most important thing is to keep doing what you are doing right now with passion, to keep it up
author: Jack Ma

text: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago
author: Warren Buffett

text: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

text: Don’t risk more than you can afford to lose!
author: The Backroads Bosslady

text: Knowledge without action is meaningless
author: Abu Bakr

text: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it
author: Unknown

text: Service is the rent we pay for being. It is the very purpose of life, and not something you do in your spare time
author: Marian Wright Edelman

text: Life’s too short to learn from your own mistakes. So learn from others
author: Unknown

text: If your ship doesn’t come in, swim out to meet it!
author: Jonathan Winters

text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
author: Steve Jobs

text: Business has only two functions – marketing and innovation
author: Peter Drucker

text: Have the end in mind and every day make sure your working towards it
author: Ryan Allis

text: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers
author: Ralph Nader

text: Paying attention to simple little things that most men neglect makes a few men rich
author: Henry Ford

text: Formal education will make you a living; self education will make you a fortune
author: Jim Rohn

text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: Stopping advertising to save money is like stopping your watch to save time
author: Henry Ford

text: One day your life will flash before your eyes. Make sure it is worth watching
author: Unknown

text: Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway
author: John Wayne

text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence then is not an act but a habit
author: Aristotle

text: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it
author: Maya Angelou

text: Advertising is only evil when it advertises evil things
author: David Ogilvy

text: What the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

text: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes
author: Zig Ziglar

text: Creative without strategy is called art. Creative with strategy is called advertising
author: Jeff  I. Richards

text: Be content to act, and leave the talking to others
author: Baltasa

text: A goal is a dream with a deadline
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere
author: Albert Einstein

text: If you can’t feed a team with two pizzas, it’s too large
author: Jeff Bezos

text: Poor people have big TV. Rich people have big library
author: Jim Rohn

text: Don’t be evil
author: Larry Page

text: Good ideas come from bad ideas, but only if there are enough of them
author: Seth Godin

text: Identify your problems but give your power and energy to solutions
author: Tony Robbin

text: Be content to act, and leave the talking to others
author: Baltasa

text: Failure defeats losers, failure inspires winners
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

text: There’s no shortage of remarkable ideas, what’s missing is the will to execute them
author: Seth Godin

text: People rarely buy what they need. They buy what they want
author: Seth Godin

text: Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt
author: Sun Tzu

text: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
author: Johann wolfgang von Goethe

text: You have to be burning with an idea, or a problem, or a wrong that you want to right. If you're not passionate enough from the start, you'll never stick it out
author: Steve Jobs

text: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection
author: Bernard Branson

text: Done is better than perfect
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane
author: Criss Jami

text: Knowledge is power is time is money
author: Robert Thier

text: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get
author: Warren Buffett

text: The best way to predict your future is to create it
author: Peter Drucker

text: Advertising is legitimised lying
author: H.G. Wells

text: who wishes to fight must first count the cost
author: Sun Tzu

text: Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

text: My own business always bores me to death; I prefer other people's
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team
author: Phil Jackson

text: You have to work on the business first before it works for you
author: Idowu Koyenikan

text: I would prefer a sword to fight duel, but a pen to plan a war
author: Robert Thier

text: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: There's no luck in business. There's only drive, determination, and more drive
author: Sophie Kinsella

text: Business is a game, played for fantastic stakes, and you're in competition with experts. If you want to win, you have to learn to be a master of the game
author: Sidney Sheldon

text: Whenever you see a successful business, someone once made a courageous decision
author: Peter F. Drucker

text: I’m a fake fact factory. The things I make are the things I make up. Also, as a side business, I make love. Actually, I just made that up
author: Dora J. Arod

text: Rouse him, and learn the principle of his activity or inactivity. Force him to reveal himself, so as to find out his vulnerable spots
author: Sun Tzu

text: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

text: Attack is the secret of defense; defense is the planning of an attack
author: Sun Tzu

text: Fortune does favor the bold and you'll never know what you're capable of if you don't try
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: If you want to change the fruits, you will first have to change the roots. If you want to change the visible, you must first change the invisible
author: T. Harv Eker

text: Simply minding one's own business is more offensive than being intrusive. Without ever saying a word one can make a person feel less-than
author: Criss Jami

text: Business, you know, may bring money, but friendship hardly ever does
author: Jane Austen

text: Truth builds trust
author: Marilyn Suttle

text: Great results, can be achieved with small forces
author: Sun Tzu

text: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it
author: Criss Jami

text: If you hire people just because they can do a job, they’ll work for your money. But if you hire people who believe what you believe, they’ll work for you with blood and sweat and tears
author: Simon Sinek

text: A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy
author: Amit Kalantri

text: It has been my philosophy of life that difficulties vanish when faced boldly
author: Isaac Asimov

text: To escape fear, you have to go through it, not around
author: Richie Norton

text: The absence of a message sometimes is a presence of one
author: Hasse Jerner

text: If you are deliberately trying to create a future that feels safe, you will willfully ignore the future that is likely
author: Seth Godin

text: I have a head for business and a body for sin. Unfortunately, the sin appears to be gluttony
author: Jenny Colgan

text: Move not unless you see an advantage; use not your troops unless there is something to be gained; fight not unless the position is critical
author: Sun Tzu

text: The purpose of bureaucracy is to compensate for incompetence and lack of discipline
author: Jim Collins

text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value
author: Albert Einstein

text: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want
author: Zig Ziglar

text: The purpose of business is to create and keep a customer
author: Peter Drucker

text: Practice does not make perfect. Perfect practice makes perfect
author: Vince Lombardi

text: He will win who, prepared himself, waits to take the enemy unprepared
author: Sun Tzu

text: You can’t tax business. Business doesn’t pay taxes. It collects taxes
author: Ronald Reagan

text: Anyone who believes that exponential growth can go on forever in a finite world is either a madman or an economist
author: Kenneth Boulding

text: Early to bed, early to rise, work like hell, and advertise
author: Ted Turner

text: This is the music business. 'Five years is five hundred years' - your words
author: Jennifer Egan

text: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons
author: Amit Kalantri

text: To earn more, you must learn more
author: Brian Tracy

text: In business, sir, one has no friends, only correspondents
author: Alexandre Dumas

text: Think continally about what you want, not about the things you fear
author: Brian Tracy

text: the key to human development is building on who you already are
author: Tom Rath

text: I'm not a businessman, I'm a business, man!
author: Jay-Z

text: Innovation is the specific instrument of entrepreneurship...the act that endows resources with a new capacity to create wealth
author: Peter Drucker

text: A confident woman wears a smile and has this air of comfortability and pleasantness about her
author: Agu Jaachynma N.E

text: You become what you think about
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Cream always rises to the top...so do good leaders
author: John Paul Warren

text: When nations grow old the Arts grow cold And commerce settles on every tree
author: William Blake

text: When you depersonalize abrasive behavior and see it as a call for help you become a catalyst for the best kind of change
author: Marilyn Suttle

text: While others were dreaming about it - I was getting it done
author: Nathan W. Morris

text: As long as politics is the shadow of big business, the attenuation of the shadow will not change the substance
author: John Dewey

text: An entrepreneur without funding is a musician without an instrument
author: Robert A. Rice Jr

text: The future belongs to the competent. It belongs to those who are very, very good at what they do. It does not belong to the well-meaning
author: Brian Tracy

text: When a man finds this kind of woman, he will go all out for her knowing that she will not be a letdown
author: Agu Jaachynma N.E

text: We first become salesmen as children in the confession booths of our parents
author: Criss Jami

text: Being trustworthy requires: Doing the right thing. And doing things right
author: Don Peppers

text: There is enough dough in the world to make bread for us all to eat together
author: Habeeb Akande

text: I used to use business to make money. But I've learned that business is a tool. You can use it to support what you believe in
author: Po Bronson

text: That is why enemies can be great motivators. They serve as fuel for your fire
author: Simon Zingerman

text: Patience is a virtue not a vice
author: Agu Jaachynma N.E

text: When I stopped to take a breath, I noticed I had wings
author: Jodi Livon

text: I find that the harder I work , the more luck I seem to have
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: There’s not a chance we’ll reach our full potential until we stop blaming each other and start practicing personal accountability
author: John G. Miller

text: A business absolutely devoted to service will have only one worry about profits. They will be embarrassingly large
author: Henry Ford

text: I have a business appointment that I am anxious... to miss
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Don't try to follow trends. Create them
author: Simon Zingerman

text: I built them what they wanted and I made a profit off of it. Now they call me a god...What fools these mortals be
author: Benjamin R. Smith

text: Accountants are in the past, managers are in the present, and leaders are in the future
author: Paul Orfalea

text: The price of inaction is far greater than the cost of a mistake
author: Meg Whitman

text: Be the kind of person who catches the shit before it hits the fan, not the one who scrapes it off afterwards
author: Jonas Eriksson

text: No secrecy, no business
author: Toba Beta

text: Wealth is a person’s ability to survive a certain number of days forward
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

text: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up Lonley
author: selena gomez

text: A penny saved is still just a fucking penny
author: Dan Lok

text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them
author: Chris Grosser

text: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation
author: Herman Melville

text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same
author: Colin R. Davis

text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great
author: John D. Rockefeller

text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have
author: Thomas Jefferson

text: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value
author: Albert Einstein

text: Never give in except to convictions of honor and good sense
author: Winston Churchill

text: Stop chasing the money and start chasing the passion
author: Tony Hsieh
